remarks.para: May be inoperative provided ground de-icing procedures do not require their use.

numlitem.para: A portable lamp/light of adequate capacity for wing and/or control surface inspection is available to observe wing surfaces during night operations.

note.para: A portable lamp/light is considered a flashlight having at least two (2) size "D" cells or the equivalent.

placard.para: Placard Wing Illumination switch (S7) on panel M56 "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
